original: 俱舍論疏卷第三十從去秋至此冬一部始終點功已畢今窺其體元草書□傳寫之間彌成違失每披其文必迷首尾肆多勘本文少加斷推已及半分變改前緒雖恐背先賢之深慮只為勸後學之惠解尚處處有脫落重復之可勘正。
analyzed: 俱舍論疏卷第三十從去秋至此冬一部始終點功已畢今窺其體元草書□傳寫之間彌成違失每披其文必迷首尾肆多勘本文少加斷推已及半分變改前緒雖恐背先賢之深慮只為勸後學之惠解尚處處有脫落重復之可勘正。
translated: The commentary on the Abhidharmakośa, volume 30, from the end of last autumn to this winter, the entire work has been proofread and completed. Now, when I examine its essence, it is originally cursive script, but in the process of transmission, it has become increasingly erroneous. Whenever I read its text, I am always confused by the beginning and end, and I have examined the original text many times and made some judgments. I have already proofread half of it and changed the previous course. Although I am afraid of going against the deep thoughts of the sages of the past, I only do it to encourage the wise understanding of later students. There are still many omissions that need to be corrected.

translated: On the third day of the twelfth month in the third year of Bao Yan, I recorded the notes before the lamp. The former Junior Sōjō, Kakushu (written separately), finished the first exchange based on the original text of the Jionin Temple of Kōfuku Temple. The original text is quite difficult to read due to the erasures, but it is recorded for the benefit of later students.
